function	script	rand_fashion_box	{
	setarray @fashion_id[0],19507,
	40001,40002,40004,40006,40009,40010,40011,40012,40013,40014,40015,40016,40017,40018,40019,40023,40024,40025,40031,40032,40033,40034,40035,40037,40039,40041,40042,40044,	
	40046,40047,40061,40065,40068,40070,40071,40073,40074,40075,40076,40077,40082,40083,40084,40086,40087,40092,40093,40094,40095,40096,40097,40098,40100,	
	40104,40109,40111,40114,40115,40116,40117,40118,40123,40130,40133,40135,40136,40137,40140,40141,40142,40143,40144,40146,40149,40151,40154,40155,40156,	
	40157,40158,40159,40161,40162,40164,40165,40166,40171,40172,40173,40175,40177,40178,40179,40180,40181,40182,40184,40185,40186,40191,40193,40194,40197
	,40198,40200,40201,40203,40204,40205,40208,40210,40212;
	set @get_id,rand(getarraysize(@fashion_id));
	rentitem @fashion_id[@get_id],864000;
}
